error.message: Call to deprecated method strpos() of class Drupal\Component\Utility\Unicode. Deprecated in drupal:8.6.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use mb_strpos() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to conditional_styles.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
